plot: Four Dutch soccer stars' wives stand by their man, as his success determines her life and some's children's. But often they rather complicate all their lives.

produce.name: Nijenhuis & de Levita Film & TV B.V.

plot_es: Four Dutch soccer stars' wives stand by their man, as his success determines her life and some's children's. But often they rather complicate all their lives.
title: Voetbalvrouwen
